ItemDescription.Value:
English below. 可配置的战场小地图。 Configurable battle mini map.
存档兼容性： 这个mod不会向存档读写任何东西，放心随时启用随时卸载。
使用指南： 按M可开关地图和切换地图模式。 长按alt可临时开关地图。 地图缩放会随人物移动速度变化而变化。
在场景中按L键可打开配置菜单。
快捷键列表： M - 切换地图显示和地图模式 alt - 临时开关地图 L - 打开配置菜单 所有快捷键均可在配置菜单中设置。
Save compatibility: This mod won't read/write anything from/into your save, so you can feel free to enable or uninstall this mod at any time.
Usage: Press M to toggle map visibility and map mode. Keep pressing ALT to temporarily toggle map visibility. The map scale will change with player's movement speed. Press L to open config menu during battles. Check the "Control Ally After Death" option to automatically control your teammate after you are down, to avoid your troops automatically charging or following AI's order.
Hotkeys: M - Toggle map visibility and map mode. alt - temporarily toggle map visibility L - Open the config menu. All the hotkeys can be changed in config menu.
links： Nexusmods: https://www.nexusmods.com/mountandblade2bannerlord/mods/2672
